resources.string: ReactiveView is a React Native Android Component to load a React Native JS Bundle in the Android App.Using this component,We develop an App with both Android component and React Native component.

Click the below button.In the detail activity, you can see two Tabs "Local" which loads the JSBundle from the asset folder.Another Tab called "Remote" which will loads the JSBundle downloaded from the Remote server. Initially this "Remote" Tab will be empty.

Click and download the JSBundle from the remote server.After, you seen the toast message download completed. Go to the detail screen by click above button.Now, you can see the JSBundle loaded in the "Remote" Tab.
